00014 #ifndef ULIB_UXML2TRANSFORM_H
00015 #define ULIB_UXML2TRANSFORM_H 1

00017 #include <ulib/xml/libxml2/document.h>
00018 
00019 #include <libxml/tree.h>
00020 #include <libxml/xpath.h>
00021 
00022 class U_EXPORT UBaseTranform {
00023 public:
00024 
00025         // Check for memory error
00026         U_MEMORY_TEST
00027 
00028         // Allocator e Deallocator
00029         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00030         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00031 
00032         // The transform usage bit mask
00033 
00034         enum Usage {
00035                 NONE              = 0x0000, // usage is unknown or undefined
00036                 DSIG              = 0x0001, // Transform could be used in <dsig:Transform>
00037                 C14N              = 0x0002, // Transform could be used in <dsig:CanonicalizationMethod>
00038                 DIGEST    = 0x0004, // Transform could be used in <dsig:DigestMethod>
00039                 SIGNATURE  = 0x0008, // Transform could be used in <dsig:SignatureMethod>
00040                 ENCRYPTION = 0x0010, // Transform could be used in <enc:EncryptionMethod>
00041                 ANY               = 0xFFFF  // Transform could be used for operation
00042         };
00043 
00044         Usage   usage;          // the allowed transforms usages
00045         const char*     name; // the transform's name
00046         const char*     href;   // the transform's identification string (href)
00047 
00048                                 UBaseTranform() {}
00049         virtual ~UBaseTranform() {}
00050 
00051         // method VIRTUAL to define
00052 
00053         virtual int readNode()          { return 0; } // the XML node read method
00054         virtual int writeNode()         { return 0; } // the XML node write method
00055         virtual int setKey()                    { return 0; } // the set key method
00056         virtual int setKeyReq()         { return 0; } // the set key requirements method
00057         virtual int verify()                    { return 0; } // the verify method (for digest and signature transforms)
00058         virtual int getDataType()       { return 0; } // the input/output data type query method
00059         virtual int pushBin()           { return 0; } // the binary data "push thru chain" processing method
00060         virtual int popBin()                    { return 0; } // the binary data "pop from chain" procesing method
00061         virtual int pushXml()           { return 0; } // the XML data "push thru chain" processing method
00062         virtual int popXml()                    { return 0; } // the XML data "pop from chain" procesing method
00063         virtual int execute()           { return 0; } // the low level data processing method used by default implementations of pushBin,popBin,pushXml and popXml
00064 
00065 private:
00066         UBaseTranform(const UBaseTranform&)            {}
00067         UBaseTranform& operator=(const UBaseTranform&) { return *this; }
00068 };
00069 
00070  /*
00071   * The Base64 transform klass (http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/#sec-Base-64).
00072   * The normative specification for base64 decoding transforms is RFC 2045
00073   * (http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt). The base64 Transform element has 
00074   * no content. The input is decoded by the algorithms. This transform is 
00075   * useful if an application needs to sign the raw data associated with 
00076   * the encoded content of an element.
00077   */
00078 
00079 class U_EXPORT UTranformBase64 {
00080 public:
00081 
00082         UTranformBase64()
00083                 {
00084                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTranformBase64, "", 0)
00085 
00086                 usage = DSIG;
00087                 name  = "base64";
00088                 href  = "http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64";
00089                 }
00090 
00091         ~UTranformBase64()
00092                 {
00093                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTranformBase64)
00094                 }
00095 
00096 private:
00097         UTranformBase64(const UTranformBase64&)            {}
00098         UTranformBase64& operator=(const UTranformBase64&) { return *this; }
00099 };
00100

00103

00107 
00108                 usage = DSIG;
00109                 name  = "base64";
00110                 href  = "http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64";
00111                 }
00112

00114                 {

00116                 }
00117

00119         UTranformInclC14N(const UTranformInclC14N&)            {}
00120         UTranformInclC14N& operator=(const UTranformInclC14N&) { return *this; }
00121 };

00123 
00124 class U_EXPORT UXML2Transform {
00125 public:
00126 
00127         // Check for memory error
00128         U_MEMORY_TEST
00129 
00130         // Allocator e Deallocator
00131         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00132         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00133 
00134         // The transform execution status
00135 
00136         enum State {
00137                 NONE            = 0,    // status unknown
00138                 WORKING = 1,    // transform is executed
00139                 FINISHED = 2,   // transform finished
00140                 OK                      = 3,    // transform succeeded
00141                 FAIL            = 4     // transform failed (an error occur)
00142         };
00143 
00144         // transform data type bit mask
00145 
00146         enum DataType {
00147                 NONE     = 0x0000, // transform data type is unknown or nor data expected
00148                 BINARY = 0x0001, // binary transform data
00149                 XML      = 0x0002  // xml transform data
00150         };
00151 
00152         // URI transform type bit mask
00153 
00154         enum UriType {
00155                 NONE                      = 0x0000, // URI type is unknown or not set
00156                 EMPTY                     = 0x0001, // empty URI ("") type
00157                 SAME_DOCUMENT = 0x0002, // same document ("#...") but not empty ("") URI type
00158                 TYPE_LOCAL        = 0x0004, // local URI ("file:///....") type
00159                 TYPE_REMOTE       = 0x0008, // remote URI type
00160                 TYPE_ANY                  = 0xFFFF  // Any URI type
00161         };
00162 
00163         // The transform operation
00164 
00165         enum Operation {
00166                 NONE            = 0,    // operation is unknown
00167                 ENCODE  = 1,    // encode operation (for base64 transform)
00168                 DECODE  = 2,    // decode operation (for base64 transform)
00169                 SIGN            = 3,    // sign or digest operation
00170                 VERIFY  = 4     // verification of signature or digest operation
00171                 ENCRYPT = 5,    // encryption operation
00172                 DECRYPT = 6,    // decryption operation
00173         };
00174 
00175         // The transform operation mode
00176 
00177         enum Mode {
00178                 NONE = 0, // mode unknown
00179                 PUSH = 1, // pushing data thru transform
00180                 POP  = 2         // popping data from transform
00181         };
00182 
00183         // The transform structure
00184 
00185         typedef struct transform {
00186                 Status status;                  //      the current status
00187                 Operation operation;    //      the transform's operation
00188                 UBaseTranform* id;      // the transform id (pointer to)
00189                 UString inBuf;                  // the input binary data buffer
00190                 UString outBuf;         // the output binary data buffer
00191                 xmlNodePtr hereNode; // the pointer to transform's <dsig:Transform /> node
00192                 xmlNodePtr inNodes;     // the input XML nodes
00193                 xmlNodePtr outNodes; // the output XML nodes
00194         } transform;
00195 
00196         // COSTRUTTORI
00197 
00198          UXML2Transform(const UString& xmldoc);
00199         ~UXML2Transform();
00200 
00201         const char* getName() const
00202                 {
00203                 U_TRACE(0, "UXML2Transform::getName()")
00204 
00205                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00206 
00207                 const char* result = (impl_->name ? (const char*)impl_->name : "");
00208 
00209                 U_RETURN(result);
00210                 }
00211 
00212 #ifdef DEBUG
00213         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00214 #endif
00215 
00216 protected:
00217 
00218          int status,                    // the transforms chain processing status
00219                   enabledUris;          // the allowed transform data source uri types
00220 
00221          xmlChar* uri;                  // the data source URI without xpointer expression
00222          xmlChar* xptrExpr;     // the xpointer expression from data source URI (if any)
00223 
00224         // xmlSecPtrList        enabledTransforms;
00225          
00226 private:
00227         UXML2Transform(const UXML2Transform&)            {}
00228         UXML2Transform& operator=(const UXML2Transform&) { return *this; }
00229 };
00230 
00231 #endif
